subject: Re: [junit] why are the Assert methods static?
msgSnippet: ... I can t answer your other questions, but I have a counter-question: *why* do you want to log all the assertions? -- Chris electric hedgehog Dollin
messageBody:
On Wednesday 16 February 2005 23:27, Bradley, Todd wrote:
> Hi, I've run into something interesting that I hope will ultimately
> improve my understanding of good Java design. I want to extend JUnit to
> do logging asserts, that is, print out a message every time one of the
> assert* methods is executed.

I can't answer your other questions, but I have a counter-question:
*why* do you want to log all the assertions?

--
Chris "electric hedgehog" Dollin
